text.en: Your wisdom is equal to that of noble Mañjuśrī,
text.en-trans: khyenrab pakpa jampal yang dang nyam

text.en: Your loving compassion is like Avalokiteśvara’s.
Your power is indivisible from the Lord of Secrets—
Ledrel Tsal, recipient of the Heart-Essence treasures,2
text.en-trans: nyingtik ter gyi kabab ledrel tsal

text.en: Regent of the Lotus-Born, renowned as Drimé Özer,
Resident of Samyé embraced by Vimala,
Longchen Rabjam, at your feet I pray!
text.en-trans: longchen rabjam zhab la solwa deb
